name: To The Clouds
description:
Use A and D or left and right arrows to move, space bar to jump. Press P or click the top right pause icon to pause the game. In the pause menu, you have an option to switch the game view to zoom out and see the entire map. 

To win the game, run all the way to the top and collide with the big rainbow ball. Each coin gives you 1 point and each rainbow ball gives 10 points, the last rainbow ball gives 20 points. There is a total of 7 rainbow balls on the map. If you fall off the map, you die. Good luck and have fun!

Go full-screen for a better gaming experience (full-screen button at the bottom right corner).

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Assets: 2D Sprites pack, Ninja Sprite Sheet from Unity Asset Store.

Music: All from ZapSplat.com unless stated otherwise

  • Main Menu - Executive Suite
  • Game: 
    • Moving Day
    • Game music – retro, arcade melody with electro drums and synth elements
  • Button
    • Computer menu button, select sound
    • Tick (Soundbible.com)
  • Pickup
    • (coin) Retro 8-bit video game coin collect or pick up 1 
    • (ball) Collect several coins at once, synthesized game tone 1
  • Game Over
    • (win) Arcade game level complete tone
    • (die) Bold synth game tone, negative, fail
